text_block_list.text:
――10th one finished! 
Huu-……Trainer-san, how's my time……?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Fufu, maybe it's because Trainer-san 
is standing at the goal? Just kidding.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Anyways! With this, we're done for today, right!? 
And so……after this, are you free?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
You see, I'm part of the committee for the Test of Courage event! 
And, today I'm going to be making the final checks on the course.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, could you do a trial run of the course? 
And if you could tell me your thoughts, I'd be really glad!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
So I'd be previewing the Test of Courage…… 
Since she was so hard working and positive, 
this might be a good opportunity to help her out.
choice_data_list: If you're fine with me, sure!
If you're fine with me, sure!

text_block_list.text:
――And so, we made our way to the starting point of the Test 
of Courage. A student was already there to act as a guide.

Just go straight down this path. Place this candle-shaped light 
at the shrine near the goal to clear the test. Good luck out there!
text_block_list.name: Guide-role Uma Musume

text_block_list.text:
There was an eerie sound of dripping water coming 
from somewhere……it sent a chill down my spine……
(Drip)

Suddenly, something cold fell on my back! Water maybe……? 
At least, I really hope it's just water……!

The visibility was poor and it made me hesitate 
to move forward……I could feel my heartbeat getting 
louder. But, I need to keep moving――
(Tap……tap……――click, click……step, step, step――)
Ah……Aaah, Aaaaaaaahhh~~~……!
(Step step step step step! ――Pull!)
――――Ahaa, did I scare you?
It's me, Trainer-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Oh dear……the goal is right ahead though―― 
……shall we go together?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I was struggling to get my heartbeat under control…… 
but Sakura Laurel led me and we soon arrived at the shrine.

Okay, here's the goal! 
Good job out there! So, how was it?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Each of the scares was timed perfectly, but Sakura 
Laurel's role as the ghost was the most terrifying――

While I was giving my thoughts, she had suddenly disappeared. 
……Was she trying to scare me again?
choice_data_list: Laurel, you won't get me again――

text_block_list.text: (――Grip!)

Something grabbed my arm and pulled 
me with a tremendous force――
(Rustle rustle rustle――!)

Weren't we supposed to already be at the goal!? 
I was being dragged through the dark, confused 
and scared with no idea what was happening――
Fufuu♪
――Suddenly I could see again.

Tadaa! 
It's beautiful isn't it, Trainer-san!?

Did I scare you? 
My surprise was a big success then, huh♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: My gratitude towards Trainer-san!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
It's a special scenery that I found―― 
and I wanted to show it to Trainer-san first.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: Do you like it?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I couldn't think of why she was that grateful. 
Today, all I did was help with her Test of Courage――
Fufuu, you were scared through and through, huh♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: ――But because you're like that, you're really helping me.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: Like earlier, when we went out together――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, you were really interested in all the things 
I loved. You were having fun just listening to me talk――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
And when you said French cuisine was like magic―― 
I was surprised. Because……I believe that too!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Today was like that too. The Test of Courage course that 
I made, you challenged it head-on, and got scared by it――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
The Test of Courage will be a great success! 
I'm convinced of that.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
And also――do you remember? 
When there was some trouble with the gym equipment?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
At that time, you said it right? 
My positivity is what made sure everything went so well.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: But, the reason I can keep running with that positivity――
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: 『I can help with that! Let's do it!』
『I can help with that! Let's do it!』

Is because……Trainer-san is always there, 
working hard to support me.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
That's why……I can keep running forward. 
Because Trainer-san is with me.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: ……and that part of you reminds me of my dad.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
With a giggle, she turned to look up at the sky. As she said, 
this was special, there was a spectacular view of the sky.

The night sky was lit up by the brilliant stars. 
But to me, there was something that shined brighter――
――I can still keep getting stronger.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Sakura Laurel declared that silently, but with conviction. 
There was true belief reflected in those eyes.
――Because I have you.
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
She was radiant――Brighter, stronger, and more 
dazzling than anyone……――As a trainer, I wanted 
to continue to support a girl that brilliant.
